title: Covid-19: Portugal queries amber list move as UK stresses risk to unlocking
content:
1. Covid-19: Portugal queries amber list move as UK stresses risk to unlocking  BBC News
  2. UK restricts travel from Portugal as variant fears grow ahead of reopening  FRANCE 24 English
  3. UK drops Portugal from safe travel list in major blow to airlines  Reuters
  4. Pushing Portugal onto the amber list will hit tourism hard  Telegraph.co.uk
  5. Holidays cancelled: Portugal added to travel 'amber list' by UK  Channel 4 News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
